Daniel Fridgren — Senior UX Design for product leaders

About

Senior UX Design for product leaders who need a strong partner


I'm Daniel Fridgren, a senior UX designer currently working at In Wise Company, where I help organizations build complex products with simple user flows, all the way from early discovery to final implementation.
With 20 years of hands-on experience across established product companies and fast-moving agencies, I bring structure, direction, and design that holds up in the real world.
My approach blends strategic insight with practical delivery: understand what matters, prioritize effectively, deliver quickly, and create solutions that stand the test of time.
Want to discuss a project or explore working together?
Book a meeting

Services

Supporting product teams with clarity and direction

  • Product design

    From early discovery to final interface — translating insights, constraints and business goals into products that work.

  • User research

    Planning and conducting research to uncover needs, reduce uncertainty and inform product decisions with evidence.

  • Prototyping & validation

    Building interactive prototypes to explore concepts, validate assumptions and improve usability before investing in development.

  • Design strategy

    Clarifying product direction by aligning user needs, business priorities, and technical realities.

  • Design team enablement

    Helping organisations grow confident, autonomous design teams through coaching, hiring support and practical ways of working.

Selected case studies

A curated mix of UX, discovery and research work from recent engagements.
How can lightweight methods unlock better decisions, faster alignment, and a more self-sufficient organisation?

Refined

How do you design healthcare journeys that stay clinically precise while remaining calm, clear, and usable for real patients?

Min Doktor

How can iterative prototyping reveal the right interaction model for next-generation dialysis machines?

Baxter

How do you design a coherent smart-home interaction model that unifies energy insights, device control, and security into one ecosystem?
